entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Revisit params logic in OverloadResolution #70923
  • Nuget for Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset 4.8.0 #70919
  • [Bug]: No IntelliSense pop-ups within interpolation expressions #70918

Closed

  • [Bug]: Renaming `record` property symbol from `record` definition does not apply refactor to property pattern expressions #70917
  • Multi-line comment formatting issue #8275
    Backlog
  • Unhelpful error from event hookup #7565
    Backlog
  • Call Hierarchy not navigating/searching some symbols #7528
    Backlog
  • Passed by reference before it has been assigned a value #48160
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio Editor Classifier partly broken because ISignature is casted to Signature #7332
    Backlog
  • Add performance test for FixAllProvider #7636
    Backlog
  • Allow Project to expose information on Resources #7772
    Backlog
  • InvalidCastException while reducing explicit name #7920
    Backlog
  • Infrastructure: Make workspaces and features layers tests portable to CoreCLR #7040
    Backlog
  • Lightbulb Diff Preview doesn't ensure alignment of diff segments #5333
    Backlog
  • Update snippets to use modern language features (eg "nameof") #5574
    Backlog
  • Rich text/ASCII art/images in IntelliSense XML comments #1607
    Backlog
  • Make RemoveUnnecessaryImportsService a public API #1576
    Backlog
  • Intellisense failure for await in non-async method (regression from VS2013) #1884
    Backlog
  • Compiler failure introduced with Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp v4.4.0 #70894
  • Impossible to implement Source Generators for projects targeting .NET 8 #70922
  • Execute roslynator analyze in a python script doesn't work in some case #70915

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2317474 #70928
  • Enable route embedded language features in vscode #70927
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make sure document is frozen in semantic snippet provider #70926
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix override completion with nint/nuint parameters #70925
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Return correct kind for PE lambdas #70920
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement null conditional await #70916
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Pass project info to the Razor extension in VS Code #70913
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add GetSemanticModel method with disableNullableAnalysis flag #70912
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Simplify logic around `params` parameters in `OverloadResolution.AnalyzeArguments` #70911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Use more specific return type for `Binder.ConvertCollectionExpression` method. #70921
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next
  • Add note about deeply nested expressions #70924
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Ship Devkit dependencies as a nuget package to support directly including in the C# extension #70875
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Convert our checksum type into a struct #70873
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move our OOP syncing code off of source-text checksums, onto content hashes. #70893
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Automatically detect missing NuGet packages and restore #70851
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support implicit indexer access in object initializers #70649
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, untriaged
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update to the latest dotnet/command-line-api version #70817
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Allow analyzer exceptions to fall through if desired #70729
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove extra logic to see if users are squatting on keywords #59086
    Area-IDE
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid cycle in tuple explicit interface implementation #70694
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC: Defer lambda rude edit reporting to runtime #70418
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
